com.interpss.dc.pv

Interface PVDcNetwork

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.hazelcast.nio.serialization.DataSerializable, DcNetwork, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, IChildNet, NameTag, Network<DcBus,DcBranch>, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PVDcNetworkImpl

    public interface PVDcNetwork
extends DcNetwork
    A representation of the model object 'PV Dc Network'. Network concept for PV analysis and simulation

    The following features are supported:

    • Pv Models
    See Also:
    PVDcSystemPackage.getPVDcNetwork()

    • Method Detail

      • getPvModels

        org.eclipse.emf.common.util.EList<PVModel> getPvModels()
        Returns the value of the 'Pv Models' containment reference list. The list contents are of type PVModel.

        If the meaning of the 'Pv Models' containment reference list isn't clear, there really should be more of a description here...

        Returns:
        the value of the 'Pv Models' containment reference list.
        See Also:
        PVDcSystemPackage.getPVDcNetwork_PvModels()

              throws InterpssException,
